scripts.info: echo 'Simple JS for Apps, supports defer/async and uses native JS with no external libs'
scripts.build: echo '=> Build All' && uglifyjs -c drop_console=true src/event.js src/app.js src/manager.js -o dist/simple.min.js
scripts.build:dev: echo '=> Build All' && uglifyjs -c drop_console=false src/event.js src/app.js src/manager.js -o dist/simple.dev.min.js
